Unwarping is a particular way in which the omnidirectional image can be visualised.  The code to do this was originally written by [http://www.csc.kth.se/~pronobis/ Andrzej Pronobis].

Example usage:

{{{
    omniclops --dev /dev/video0 --unwarp
}}}
